title: Command Description
description: A description of a command which can be sent to the Reach device

id.Description: A unique identifier for the command.  This will be assigned automatically if not defined.

name.Description: A unique name for the command

description.Description: A short description of the command

timeout.Description: The maximum time the command should take to execute, in seconds

accessLevelRequired.Description: A list of the access levels which get access to this command
